snippet: The Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center presents programs all over the world, from Seoul, South Korea, to Pleasant Hill, Ky., and now the society plans to increase its audience upstate, too.
abstract: David Finckel and Wu Han, artistic directors of Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center, have established three-year residency at Purchase College’s Performing Arts Center, established in 2014; say endeavor has been a win-win, offering local residents opportunity to hear internationally known artists, expanding pool of Lincoln Center devotees, and lifting reputation of college’s conservatory.
lead_paragraph: The Chamber Music Society of Lincoln Center presents programs all over the world, from Seoul, South Korea, to Pleasant Hill, Ky., and now the society plans to increase its audience upstate, too.

headline.print_headline: Taking Chamber Music Far Away, and Not So Far
headline.main: Chamber Music Society Aims to Expand Its Reach
